Home.app_description: Train tracking application with accurate data and useful information.

SettingsComponent.dialog_description: Here you can customize your MHaV experience. These are only saved locally, for this device.
SettingsComponent.tooltip_description: Display the train type and potential name when hovering over trains
SettingsComponent.station_names_description: Display station names on the map
SettingsComponent.station_names_opacity_description: Adjust the transparency of station names
SettingsComponent.trains_description: Show MÁV trains on the map
SettingsComponent.hev_description: Show suburban railway (HÉV) on the map
SettingsComponent.idk_where_the_trains_are: Dear users! We cannot display those vehicles that are not marked by EMMA itself. If you do notice any discrepancies, please let us know by email.
SettingsComponent.hobby_project_notice: This is a hobby project that we work on in our free time. Please don't expect immediate fixes or updates if something breaks.

TrainPanel.delay_note: This is the more accurate delay calculated by us. The timetable data is directly based on the EMMA data (sometimes inaccurate).
TrainPanel.data_discrepancy_warning: On this train, the delay data reported by MÁV does not match the train's actual GPS-based position.
TrainPanel.algorithm_note: This works based on our developed algorithm. We are still working on perfecting it and it may occasionally be wrong.
TrainPanel.route_data_warning: This vehicle appears to have bad route data.

DelayLegend.title: Delay legend
DelayLegend.note: The colors are shown on the map and timetable

ComputerBadge.text: This feature is only available on computers

MobileBadge.text: This feature is only available on mobile devices

NoDataDialog.title: No data available
NoDataDialog.description: We're not receiving any data at the moment. Please try again later.
NoDataDialog.stale_data_description: The external API is not responding. Showing data that is {minutes, plural, =1 {# minute} other {# minutes}} old.
